entities.label: Investigation into Allegations of Theft and Corruption at Pristina Airport

edges.label: 1. Oversight Authority
edges.tooltip: UNMIK was responsible for overseeing operations and compliance at Pristina International Airport.

edges.label: 2. Subject of Investigation
edges.tooltip: Pristina International Airport was the subject of investigation for alleged corruption and financial irregularities.

edges.label: 3. Investigation Conducted By
edges.tooltip: The investigation was conducted by UNMIK as part of their oversight responsibilities.

edges.label: 4. Applicable Law
edges.tooltip: The investigation referenced Regulation UNMIK-1999-24 as part of the legal framework.

edges.label: 5. Applicable Law
edges.tooltip: The investigation referenced UN-Staff Regulation 1.2 (b) regarding staff conduct.

edges.label: 6. Applicable Law
edges.tooltip: The investigation referenced UN-Staff Rule 110.1 concerning misconduct.

Pristina International Airport: Overcharging commercial flights for handling and landing fees.
Failure to account for monies paid for handling and landing services.
Requesting or receiving corrupt payments for allocating convenient landing slots.
